Event.Message: File name %2 was associated with key %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FileKey" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: File name %2 was disassociated with key %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FileKey" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: File Create was requested (%1) for file object %3 with name %7.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Irp" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ThreadId" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FileObject" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CreateOptions" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="CreateAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ShareAccess" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
